commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Limit usage of _ as a regex delimiter
commits.body:
Now requires whitespace between m and _ to prevent false positives.

```perl
$abc->m_xyz;		# method

$abc->s_xyz;		# method

m_xyz_;					# constant

m _xyz_;				# pattern
```
